name: Solitaire: Classic Card Puzzles
description:
Solitaire is also known as Klondike Solitaire or Patience. Now it is always available in your pocket!

Feature highlights:
- online game with Facebook friends or random opponents from all over the world
- single tap, double tap or drag and drop to move a card
- unlimited free undo move
- "magnet" to automatically send cards to foundation
- totally free and unlimited "hint" to show possible moves
- "magic" to help you, when you are stuck
- track your achievements in leaderboard
- big and easy to see cards

Download Solitaire, climb the leaderboard and become the King of the Hill!
